item.title: Sunset Illusion
item.description: tags Astrophysics source YouTube Sunset Illusion When light travels from one medium to another, it refracts. You can see this when you look at a straw through a glass of water.

item.title: How to take smart notes
item.description: Taking smart notes take fleeting notes. Have a single place where all your notes go. These notes won’t be part of your zettelkasten.

item.title: Earth's Orbit is not a long ellipse
item.description: tags Astrophysics source YouTube Earth’s orbit around the sun it’s not a circle, not a long ellipse either.

item.title: The Gettier Problem
item.description: tags Learning, Sotware Development source Gettiers The Gettier Problem To know something is to have a justified true belief about it:

item.title: Bulk Export org-mode to md
item.description: tags OrgMode, Emacs, Workflows source Bulk export org-mode to markdown TODO: implement the script in the above link to make the following changes: - send all org files to a specific folder where Docsify is hosted - index.

item.title: Book: The Great Mental Models Vol.1
Distributed Caching
item.description: tags Caching source What is Distributed Caching Notes Cache is used to get the most frequently requested information faster instead of making a database call What are caches mainly used for?

item.title: Do Better Code Reviews
item.description: tags Sotware Development Things to keep in mind while doing code reviews: While giving a comment, never mention the person, always reference the code.

item.title: Emacs
item.description: tags Productivity, OrgMode Keybindings Following are some of the commonly needed keybindings that I may not remember Feature Keybinding Comment Doom reload SPC h r r No need to restart Emacs.

item.title: LifeProTips
item.description: Opening a banana upside down will make the stringy things stick to the peel (source: reddit)

item.title: Map is not the Territory
item.description: tags Mental Models, Learning, Book: The Great Mental Models Vol.1, Books source The Great Mental Models Vol. 1 The Map is not the Territory In other words, the description of the thing is not the thing itself.

item.title: Mental Models
item.description: The quality of our thinking is largely influenced by the mental models in our heads. We learn something specific and don’t get exposure to the big ideas of other disciplines.

item.title: NoSQL Databases
item.description: tags Databases source NoSQL Databases Comparison with RDBMS NoSQL RDBMS insertions and retrievals are easy since all data are together in a JSON blob needs foreign keys and other tables for getting a coherent set of data doesn’t guarantee ACID properties, so it can’t be used for transactions guarantees ACID not read optimzed because it has to go to each row, unpack the JSON and update easier because it just has to go to that column and do aggregations relations are not implicit, which means something like foreign key constraint cannot be enforced relationships are implicit not built for joins and they are very expensive built for joins

item.title: OrgMode links to headings
item.description: tags Emacs, Productivity, OrgMode, Workflows Add a link to headings in other org files Use file:~/path/to/file.org::Target Target searches for a heading called Target.

item.title: OrgMode Smart Archive
item.description: tags OrgMode, Emacs, Workflows Smart Archive So far, my workflow in OrgMode for managing tasks and events was to have one file called organize.

item.title: Podcasts
item.description: Some of them I actively listen to, others are just for reference: LetsKnowThings Joe Rogan Experience Naval Podcast Philosophize This King Falls AM Stoicism for a Better Life Brain Lenses Derek Sivers Meta Mind Sean Carroll’s Mindscape Seen and the Unseen Eric Weinstein’s Portal The Tim Ferriss Show Future Thinkers Podcast

item.title: Stoicism
item.description: tags Personal Development, Philosophy Quotes An unexamined life is not worth living - Socrates The Dichotomy of Control There are things that you can control and there are things that you cannot control.

item.title: Writing
item.description: Mostly, tips for blogging. But, can be applied in general also. A Blogging Style Guide A Blogging Style Guide Vol.

item.title: Cooking Tips
item.description: tags Cooking, LifeProTips While sauteing onions, add salt to make it cook faster If you add excess salt in your curry, add a piece of potato for some time.
